title: Life Tracker Lee Jae Goo
overview: Can you find the courage to do what's right?Lee Jae Goo is a lawyer without much of a moral compass, to the extent that he has no qualms about seeking out potential clients at a funeral. As he failed his bar exam, he only takes on small cases due to his fear of failure. One day, he meets a new client whose spouse was the victim in an industrial accident, and taking on this case will change his life forever.
